AI Description: dbg2olc is a tool developed for genome assembly using a de Bruijn graph based on overlap-layout-consensus (OLC) algorithm. It aims to efficiently assemble large and complex genomes by utilizing both long and short reads.
Core Features: De Bruijn Graph Assembly, Overlap-Layout-Consensus Algorithm, Hybrid Assembly Using Long & Short Reads, Efficient Assembly Of Large & Complex Genomes
General Tags: Genome Assembly, De Bruijn Graph, Olc Algorithm, Bioinformatics
